onset.Description: the onset time of the event in seconds, relative to the start of the EEG (bdf) file

duration.Description: the duration of the event in seconds

onset_sample.Description: the onset time of the event in samples, relative to the start of the EEG (bdf) file

player1_rt.Description: the response time of player 1 in seconds (no responses will show 100s)

player2_rt.Description: the response time of player 2 in seconds (no responses will show 100)
